name: Crispy Cabbage
ingredients: 1 medium head cabbage, about 27 ounces before trimming

instructions.en: Cut the cabbage into 1-inch wedges, keeping the core intact on every wedge
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte kapustu na 2,5 cm kliny, pričom dbajte na to, aby jadro zostalo na každom kline neporušené
instructions.ja: キャベツを2.5cmの楔形に切り、それぞれの楔に芯が残るようにする

instructions.en: Place cabbage wedges on a baking sheet
instructions.sk: Položte kapustové kliny na plech na pečenie
instructions.ja: キャベツの楔をベーキングシートに並べる

instructions.en: Brush one side of cabbage wedges with melted butter and sprinkle with salt and pepper
instructions.sk: Potrite jednu stranu kapustových klinov roztopeným maslom a posypte soľou a korením
instructions.ja: キャベツの楔の片面に溶かしバターを塗り、塩コショウをふる

instructions.en: Turn wedges over and repeat butter, salt, and pepper on the other side
instructions.sk: Otočte kliny a zopakujte maslo, soľ a korenie na druhej strane
instructions.ja: 楔を裏返し、もう片面にもバター、塩、コショウを同様に塗る

instructions.en: Roast at 450°F (230°C) for 20-25 minutes, until cabbage is browned around the edges
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 230°C 20-25 minút, kým kapusta nezhnedne okolo okrajov
instructions.ja: 450°F（230°C）のオーブンで20〜25分、キャベツの端が焦げ目がつくまで焼く
